doc.title: Nankai University’s 2017 Graduation Ceremony and Degree Awarding Ceremony
doc.snippet: Nankai University’s 2017 Graduation Ceremony for Undergraduate and Graduate Students and Degree Awarding Ceremony was held at Balitai and Jinnan Campuses on June 27th. 3966 students received the bachelor's degree, and 4234 students were awarded master’s degree, starting a new journey full of hope.
